DocAttribute.Name: Width
DocAttribute.Documentation: <EPM-HTML> The number of pixels in width (S) direction. </EPM-HTML>

DocAttribute.Name: Height
DocAttribute.Documentation: <EPM-HTML> The number of pixels in height (T) direction. </EPM-HTML>

DocAttribute.Name: ColourComponents
DocAttribute.Documentation: <EPM-HTML>Indication whether the pixel values contain a 1, 2, 3, or 4 colour component. </EPM-HTML>

DocAttribute.Name: Pixel
DocAttribute.Documentation:
Flat list of hexadecimal values, each describing one pixel by 1, 2, 3, or 4 components.
IFC2x Edition 3 CHANGE  The data type has been changed from STRING to BINARY.

DocWhereRule.Name: WR21
DocWhereRule.Documentation: The minimum number of pixel in width (S coordinate) direction shall be 1.

DocWhereRule.Name: WR22
DocWhereRule.Documentation: The minimum number of pixel in height (T coordinate) direction shall be 1.

DocWhereRule.Name: WR23
DocWhereRule.Documentation: The number of color components shall be either 1, 2, 3, or 4.

DocWhereRule.Name: WR24
DocWhereRule.Documentation: The list of pixel shall have exactly width*height members.
